alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Ozark (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 14 at 3:32PM CDT until May 14 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN OZARK AND SOUTH CENTRAL DOUGLAS COUNTIES... At 332 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles northwest of Gainesville, or 13 miles southeast of Ava, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported a tree down on Highway 95 in southern Ozark County. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gainesville... Wasola... Brixey... Noble... Squires... Willhoit... Rockbridge... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
